name: Drift Gift
description:
You have procrastinated enough. Now it's time to complete your delivery jobs... With only a minute remaining. So crank up the Eurobeat and drift towards success, dropping gifts along the way.

Drift Gift is a game where you play as a delivery driver that must Deliver ten Christmas gifts to houses around the village in the space of only a minute while drifting and listening to Eurobeat. This is a demo of a future Android game, soon to be released with more features, so keep your eyes open for that!

Note for Linux users: the game doesn't seem to work that well with Wine, sorry about that Thank you for looking at our game, we really hope you like it Enjoy!

 Drift Gift Nemo - Code, Idea, most of the game in general Deathtail - Art AmberReindeer - SFX, playtesting With music by D-L4Y and Waxterk
